property.name: Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Move existing fighters to new carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
notes
property.value: Tiberian Conquest mod for TripleA, the South American war theatre, by Fei. Assets based off unit cameos from C&C3 developped by EALA. Many thanks to Wisconsin and Veqryn for support on the official TripleA forums!
